google_translated: The gate of four sides closed

en_text: and tread the three-forked road from the Crown
jp_text: （カウレス）王冠より出(い)で
google_translated: With the crown out

en_text: reaching unto the Kingdom.
jp_text:
（フィオレ）
王国に至る三差路は循環せよ
google_translated: The threeships leading to the kingdom circulate

en_text: Swear your fealty to me, \Nand my life shall be your sword.
jp_text: 我が命運は なんじの剣に
google_translated: My life is the sword of what

en_text: I shall be all that is good in the world.
jp_text: 我は常世全ての善となる者
google_translated: Person who is good for all regulars

en_text: I shall ward off all that is evil in the world.
jp_text: 我は常世全ての悪を敷く者
google_translated: I have all the evil of all evils

en_text: come forth from the ring of control, \NGuardian of the Heavenly Scales!
jp_text:
抑止の輪より来たれ
てんびんの守り手よ！
google_translated:
It is coming from the ring of suppression
Tenbin protection!

en_text: My King!
jp_text: すなわち 王の配下です
google_translated: That is, it is under the king

en_text: These are the Servants our Masters of Black have summoned.
jp_text:
彼らこそ 我ら黒のマスターが
召喚したサーヴァント
google_translated:
They are our black masters
Sevant summoned

en_text: You have responded to the summons seeking the Grail.
jp_text:
聖杯を求めて
召喚に応じた者たちよ
google_translated:
In search ofthe Holy Grail
O yewhoaccording to thesummons

en_text: First we must rise to victory as the Black Faction!
jp_text:
まずは 黒の陣営として
勝利を果たせ
google_translated:
First of all as a black camp
Fulfill the victory

en_text: Eternal glory comes to those who attain victory!
jp_text:
マスターとして戦い抜いた者には
無限の栄光が約束されている
google_translated:
For those who have fought as a master
Infinite glory is promised

en_text: Fear not! We already control \Nthe legendary vessel, the Greater Grail!
jp_text:
大聖杯を
所有しているのだから！
google_translated:
The Great Holy Grail
Because it owns!

en_text: Who are you?
jp_text: お前は…
google_translated: You are…

en_text: I am Mordred, the one and true heir of Arthur Pendragon.
jp_text:
騎士王アーサー･ペンドラゴンの
唯一にして正統なる後継者
google_translated:
Knight King Arthur Pendragon
The only leader

en_text: The heavens declare the glory of God;
jp_text: （レティシア）諸天は主の栄光に
google_translated: Todai is the glory of the Lord

en_text: night after night they reveal knowled—
jp_text:
昼は言葉を伝え
夜は知識を…
google_translated:
Tell words in noon
Knowledge of night ...

en_text: Yes, allow me, Jeanne d'Arc, to help you.
jp_text: はい 聖女ジャンヌ―
